title: Free Support and ADC Coaching
body:
Little about my self. I used to play in many competitive league related events and even had the chance to go up against TSM's roster back in early season 2. In season 3 I retired and have been coaching off and on depending how busy I am running my business in real life. I have about a week off and am looking on to take on 1-2 students. If i am impressed with the progress of the student I would be happy to keep the student longer than 1 week. I am happy to coach on roles other than ADC and support but do keep in mind, It would be a learning process for me as well. My season rankings for those who are interested are Season I - 1920  Season II - 2340 Season III - Diamond 2 Season IV - Diamond 1 Season V - Diamond 3

**Please answer this questionnaire and i will add you in game if you qualify.**
Name - 
Role(s) - 
Reason you are seeking coaching - 
What would you like to improve on - 
Age - 
What would you expect out of a coach - 
Time Zone - (You can just put your country or state if you do not know your time zone)
Schedule - (Are you willing to follow a set schedule for coaching)
Questions for me -

replies.body:
Name - Best Jrod NA
Role(s) - ADC
Reason you are seeking coaching - League has been the one game I haven't been able to become good at easily it's what keeps me playing and frustrates me at the same time lol
What would you like to improve on - I'd like to improve my landing and knowledge of the macro side of the game. 
Age - 25
What would you expect out of a coach - someone who pushes me to be better not like man you play better than your elo I want a coach to be like that's not how a diamond player would play it do better.

Time Zone - (You can just put your country or state if you do not know your time zone). Est
Schedule - (Are you willing to follow a set schedule for coaching) Yes I do work full time so as long as we coordinate I'll be there.
Questions for me - I'm looking for a coach to really get into the fine details with me like looking into team fights and figuring where I could have gotten in one more auto to possibly turn the fight. I also want to know the game on a bigger scale like wave control and allocating resources ect. What do you expect out of me being your student? I'm always willing to learn more and always try to pick the brains of players higher ranked than I. Would you be willing to give me feedback on clips that I could send you even if we don't have a session planned?

Name - iExpose
Role(s) - ADC
Reason you are seeking coaching - To help me understand the game more and to reach to the higher elo's  
What would you like to improve on - How to control the game and in lane. Also, most importantly, SHOTCALLING
Age - 16
What would you expect out of a coach - 
Time Zone - (You can just put your country or state if you do not know your time zone) Central Time
Schedule - (Are you willing to follow a set schedule for coaching) Yes 
Questions for me - Can i really reach the rank I desire?

Name - eC Methodical
Role(s) -  ADC/TOP
Reason you are seeking coaching - get a good read of where I am currently at and how to progress forward.
What would you like to improve on - Two words: Micro / Macro
Age - 22
What would you expect out of a coach - His time
Time Zone - (You can just put your country or state if you do not know your time zone) PST
Schedule - (Are you willing to follow a set schedule for coaching) Open
Questions for me -  Do you think Ignite and Barrier will ever return as the go to spells for ADC's ?

Name - NA SaltTrash

Role(s) - Support

Reason you are seeking coaching - I'm currently D5 and would love to improve. I know I have a lot to improve on, but am at the point where I'm not 100% sure what I need to do to continue getting better and think that a coach will help me achieve that

What would you like to improve on - mid game. I feel like I win lane and in a long game have the macro knowledge to win a late game, but seem to struggle in my overall mid game play.

Age - 19

What would you expect out of a coach - Help teach me what I need to do to get better

Time Zone - (You can just put your country or state if you do not know your time zone) PST

Schedule - (Are you willing to follow a set schedule for coaching) Yes I have a very flexible schedule

Questions for me - Do you know how often you would be willing to help me practice

Name - Jordy Flaco

Role(s) - ADC & SUPPORT

Reason you are seeking coaching - I feel like I'm right on the edge of actually being decent at this game. I tend to do pretty well but I know I lack in something because I'm not able to carry like the high elo players when they come down to my elo. I've been trying to figure out what im missing. I really want to play this game competitively and as of recent I've been actively trying to improve my play. 

What would you like to improve on -Harassing in lane, wave control and managment, macro/shotcalling

Age -24

What would you expect out of a coach - guidance and critical criticism 

Time Zone - (You can just put your country or state if you do not know your time zone) I'm in Arizona which is currently same as PST

Schedule - (Are you willing to follow a set schedule for coaching), Currently yes.. I don't work at the moment so this game is currently my life

Questions for me - How often will you be able to help me with my gameplay? I would also like to know more about the process.

Name - Media TM
Role - ADC
Reason: I've hit a wall and have no idea where it is.
What would you like to improve on: Rotations/Mid/Late Game Decision Making
Age: 22
What I Expect Out Of A Coach: Brutal honesty so I can find the areas I need to improve on
Time Zone: EST
Schedule: I can follow a set schedule to a degree. I can give you my class schedule and we can go from there
Questions For You: Not at the moment

Name -LCS lach
Role(s) -supp
Reason you are seeking coaching -to get to higher diamond
What would you like to improve on -knowing what to do mid game
Age -16
What would you expect out of a coach -to tell me where on the map i should be in the mid game
Time Zone - (You can just put your country or state if you do not know your time zone) pst
Schedule - (Are you willing to follow a set schedule for coaching)yea
Questions for me -no

Name - MChild (Matt)
Role(s) - Jungle, Learning Support
Reason you are seeking coaching - I've always wanted a coach, and I learn really fast
What would you like to improve on - Deep knowledge of the game 
Age - 18
What would you expect out of a coach - Communication, someone to call me out, talk to me, help me learn
Time Zone - (You can just put your country or state if you do not know your time zone) Alaskan
Schedule - (Are you willing to follow a set schedule for coaching) 5 pm +
Questions for me - Do you use skype, discord, curse?

Name -iBlair
Role(s) -Supp/Jng
Reason you are seeking coaching - Improve, be more dominant
What would you like to improve on - Wave control, higher level itemization, macro mechanics.
Age - 19
What would you expect out of a coach - Constructive, honest feedback. No holding back if I mess up, but acknowledgement when I do something well so I'm aware it was good. INSIGHT.
Time Zone - Eastern
Schedule - (Are you willing to follow a set schedule for coaching) Yes, as long as it doesn't interfere with work or school.

Name -Stabmewhat
Role(s) - ADC TOP Gold 1
Reason you are seeking coaching - ADC seems more like a chore than a role lately. Would love to see what else I could be doing in game.
What would you like to improve on - Maybe decision making. How to close out games quicker.
Age - 23
What would you expect out of a coach - What if Scenarios and knowledge on decisions/builds
Time Zone - (You can just put your country or state if you do not know your time zone) EST
Schedule - (Are you willing to follow a set schedule for coaching) Tues and Thurs only time restrictions.
Questions for me - When ya wanna start? =)

Name - WasThatAnEkko
Role(s) - Adc/Mid
Reason you are seeking coaching - To improve and reach higher elos 
What would you like to improve on - lane movement to abuse the enemy laner while not taking punishment
Age - 17
What would you expect out of a coach - To guide/teach/tutor
Time Zone - (You can just put your country or state if you do not know your time zone) CST
Schedule - (Are you willing to follow a set schedule on coaching) Yes, anytime after 6pm
Home work - I do give home work, would you be willing to finish it Sure
Questions for me - How long til you pick who you will teach?

> [{quoted}](name=WasThatAnEkko,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=FEaPevry,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-15T01:15:58.417+0000)
>
> Name - WasThatAnEkko
> Role(s) - Adc/Mid
> Reason you are seeking coaching - To improve and reach higher elos 
> What would you like to improve on - lane movement to abuse the enemy laner while not taking punishment
> Age - 17
> What would you expect out of a coach - To guide/teach/tutor
> Time Zone - (You can just put your country or state if you do not know your time zone) CST
> Schedule - (Are you willing to follow a set schedule on coaching) Yes, anytime after 6pm
> Home work - I do give home work, would you be willing to finish it Sure
> Questions for me - How long til you pick who you will teach?

I will be looking through applications and reaching out to candidates that interest me. You will get a yes or no answer by the end of tomorrow.

Name - LOLsmileyfaces
Role(s) - ADC and Support
Reason you are seeking coaching - To improve personal play through unbiased coaching
What would you like to improve on - Positioning, specifically in Team Fighting (who to target when)
Age - 20 
What would you expect out of a coach - I expect to have consistent unbiased feedback focussed on both short term and long term improvement along with tips and practice methods
Time Zone - CST
Schedule - Definitely willing to follow a schedule. I am currently on leave for the next week and a half.
